scripts.build: npm run validate-json && npm run type-check && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dist = path.join(process.cwd(), 'dist'); if (fs.existsSync(dist)) { fs.rmSync(dist, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('dist directory cleaned'); } else { console.log('dist directory not found'); }"
scripts.validate-json: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['experience.json', 'about.json'].forEach(file => { const filePath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'public', 'assets', file); JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8')); console.log(file + ' is valid'); }); console.log('All JSON files validated');"
